courses.name: Introduction to JavaScript
courses.description: Learn the basics of JavaScript programming.

lessons.title: JavaScript Basics
lessons.content: Introduction to variables, functions, and loops.

lessons.title: Working with Objects
lessons.content: Learn about JavaScript objects and properties.

courses.name: Advanced Python
courses.description: Master advanced Python techniques and libraries.

lessons.title: Decorators and Generators
lessons.content: Deep dive into Python decorators and generators.

lessons.title: Working with APIs in Python
lessons.content: Learn how to integrate APIs using Python.

courses.name: Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: A comprehensive course covering front-end and back-end web development.

lessons.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
lessons.content: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS to build beautiful websites.

lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.content: Learn how to use JavaScript to add interactivity to websites.

courses.name: Data Science with Python
courses.description: Learn data analysis, visualization, and machine learning with Python.

lessons.title: Data Analysis with Pandas
lessons.content: Learn how to analyze datasets using the Pandas library.

lessons.title: Data Visualization with Matplotlib
lessons.content: Create stunning data visualizations with Matplotlib.

courses.name: React.js for Beginners
courses.description: A beginner's guide to building dynamic user interfaces with React.

lessons.title: React Components
lessons.content: Understand the basics of React components and props.

lessons.title: State and Lifecycle
lessons.content: Learn how to manage state and lifecycle methods in React.
